snippet.title: PRE-ORDER NOW — Hitman: Blood Money — Reprisal Hits Nintendo Switch on January 25th
snippet.description:
Pre-order today to save 15%*: https://www.feralinteractive.com/switch-games/hitmanbloodmoney/eshop/

Hot on the heels of its incredible reception on iOS & Android, Hitman: Blood Money — Reprisal brings the revitalised stealth-action classic to Nintendo Switch on January 25th for £19.99 / $29.99 / €24.99 — save 15% when you pre-order.

The stage is set for Agent 47’s next assignment, and he’s packing an arsenal of quality-of-life upgrades inspired by later games in the series, including Instinct Mode, a minimap and trespass alerts. 

Whether docked or handheld, classic controls or modern layout, the sandbox assassination playgrounds of Hitman: Blood Money fit the Switch like a beautifully tailored suit.

Ready to make a killing? Infiltrate the eShop and save at least 15% today!

*Pre-order discount rate may vary slightly by region.

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/feralgames 
Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/FeralInteractive

#HITMAN #NintendoSwitch #hitmanbloodmoney
